articles.author: Shreyashi Sanyal
articles.title: Disney's $8.5 billion Reliance merger is a streaming wars win in sports-obsessed India - CNBC
articles.description: Disney announced Wednesday that the companies will be merging their respective Star India and Viacom18 units into a newly created Star India joint venture.
articles.content:
Disney+ Hotstar logo is seen on a smartphone and flag of India on a pc screen. (Photo Illustration by Pavlo Gonchar/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images)
